p: We used wild-type N2 (Bristol) in this study, obtained from the Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology. C. elegans were stored in the NGM, which was cultured at 22 °C and seeded with Escherichia coli OP50 ( E. coli OP50) [ 15]. Under aseptic condition, 100 spawning C. elegans were selected on a new culture medium covered with E.coli OP50, and all the C. elegans were picked out after laying eggs for 2 h. The spawning plate was cultured in an aseptic biochemical incubator (LRH-250, Shanghai China) at 22 °C for a specific period [ 16].
